name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Shiroi Kage no Shoujo
summary: The 10th installment in the Tantei Jinguuji Saburo (Jake Hunter) series, and the first portable entry. When Jingūji attends his friend's funeral, his friend's mother asks him to investigate a missing person, while police inspector Kumano asks him to investigate the urban myth called "Yū-chan".
